name: DEFEND (Dogbiskitgamer)
description:
In this tower defense game you will be preventing bugs, ships, and tanks from getting in. Click/tap on the white spaces to place spikes that will one shot bugs, deal ten damage to the tanks, but they won't effect the ships. On the grey walls you can click/tap to create two kinds of turrets, normal or sniper. Progressing each wave gives you five spikes, one turret, and 0.2 of a sniper turret. If you have one of each, you will place a normal turret before a sniper turret.

Patch 1.1: Fixed bug where third Sniper Turret could not spawn
